sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: Find the perimeter of a regular pentagon whose each side measures 7 cm.
message_2:
To find the perimeter of a regular pentagon with each side measuring 7 cm, simply multiply the length of one side by the number of sides in the pentagon. 

Perimeter = (side length) × (number of sides)
Perimeter = 7 cm × 5
Perimeter = 35 cm

The perimeter of the regular pentagon is 35 cm.
